lst.example: She is my high school schoolmate.

lst.vn: bạn chung phòng, bạn cùng phòng
lst.example: On Saturday night, I followed my roommate to a party.
I wish I have a soulmate to confide.

lst.vn: bạn đồng nghiệp, bạn đồng sự
lst.example: She was liked both by colleagues and subordinates.
For most employees, comradeship is also a very important reward.
I have the best partner in the field.

lst.vn: bạn đồng liêu, người cùng cộng tác; đồng minh
lst.example: He is currently an associate member of the club.
He is one of our staunchest allies.
She has been my ​companion past ten ​years.
He's not my boyfriend. We're just good friends.
I value friendship above all else.
Jo is a very close friend of mine.
I have a pen-friend in America.
